original_text: The gold for things of gold, and the silver for things of silver, and for all manner of work to be made by the hands of artificers. And who then is willing to consecrate his service this day unto the Lord?
korean_text: 금, 은 그릇을 만들며 장인의 손으로 하는 모든 일에 쓰게 하였노니 오늘 누가 즐거이 손에 채워 여호와께 드리겠느냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: The gold for things of gold
and the silver for things of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 은은 은으로 만든 물건을 위해

sentences.original_text: and for all manner of work to be made
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만들어질 모든 종류의 작업을 위해

sentences.original_text: to consecrate his service this day
